PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE REGULATIONS by increasing the maximum amount that may be granted to a qualifying student in any given year from $5,000 to $8,000 and by establishing a grant for high-need students with permanent disabilities, effective August 1, 2002.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2002-0219 Publication Date: 2002-06-19
